SELECT TASK_ID,TASK_NAME FROM TB_ACT_TASK_CONFIG WHERE IS_VALID='1' AND TASK_FLAG NOT IN('0','5')
AND TASK_FLAG IN ('2','3','4','7')
AND TASK_NAME LIKE '%'||#{taskName}||'%'
SELECT B.OA_COM_ID,B.OA_DEP_ID,B.OA_JOB_ID,A.USER_ID FROM TB_ACT_TASK_APPROVER A INNER JOIN APDP_USER B ON A.USER_ID=B.ID WHERE A.IS_VALID='1' AND A.TASK_ID=#{taskId}

select.if: SELECT DISTINCT OA_COM_ID AS "id",OA_COM_NAME AS "name",'x' AS "pId",'0' AS "dLevel" FROM APDP_USER WHERE OA_COM_ID IS NOT NULL AND OA_COM_NAME IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT OA_DEP_ID AS "id",OA_DEP_NAME AS "name",OA_COM_ID AS "pId",'1' AS "dLevel" FROM APDP_USER WHERE OA_DEP_ID IS NOT NULL AND OA_DEP_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OA_COM_ID=#{treeId}
SELECT DISTINCT OA_JOB_ID AS "id",OA_JOB_NAME AS "name",OA_DEP_ID AS "pId",'2' AS "dLevel" FROM APDP_USER WHERE OA_JOB_ID IS NOT NULL AND OA_JOB_NAME IS NOT NULL AND OA_DEP_ID=#{treeId}
SELECT TO_CHAR(ID) AS "id",REALNAME AS "name",OA_JOB_ID AS "pId",'3' AS "dLevel" FROM APDP_USER WHERE OA_JOB_ID=#{treeId}

mapper.delete: DELETE TB_ACT_TASK_APPROVER WHERE TASK_ID=#{taskId} AND USER_ID=#{userId}
